plot: A Communist agent planted in America creates werewolves in order to start a panic in the U.S. that will lead to a Communist takeover.
title: The Professor
plot_es: A Communist agent planted in America creates werewolves in order to start a panic in the U.S. that will lead to a Communist takeover.
plot_en: A Communist agent planted in America creates werewolves in order to start a panic in the U.S. that will lead to a Communist takeover.
